CSGO is made with such perfection and I'd like to thank Valve for being a company that listens to the fans. They frequently add updates to adjust to the fans' preferences, which is why I love Gabe and the beloved company he has created. Anyways, even though this is a game you should be playing with your friends, sometimes things can and do get heated so relationships are destroyed. Me personally, I'm a fucking god at this game and those who had challenged me have all lost. This obviously lead to jealousy and most of my peers have become my foes, one famously known as Zayar. I was once under his command, occupying my role as student, but with enough determination I overpassed his non-existent skills. Lastly, I would like to say something to a lifeless wimp named William, "shut the fuck up".
